name: @livepeer/sdk
description: A module for interacting with Livepeer's smart contracts. The SDK is a core dependency of most LivepeerJS packages.

scripts.build-main: NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir main --ignore spec.js,test.js --plugins=transform-es2015-modules-commonjs --source-maps inline
scripts.build-module: NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib --ignore spec.js,test.js --source-maps inline
scripts.copy-etc: f(){ rm -rf etc; mkdir etc; printf 'Importing truffle artifacts...'; tput sc; for x in $@/*.json; do tput rc; tput el; echo "$(basename $x)"; node -e "const {contractName,abi,networks}=require('$x');const [address]=Object.values(networks).sort((a, b) => b.updated_at - a.updated_at);console.log(JSON.stringify({name:contractName,abi,address: (address && address.address) || address}, null, 2));" > etc/$(basename $x); done; tput rc; tput el; echo 'done! :)'; };f
scripts.compile: pushd ../../node_modules/protocol && rm -rf build && yarn && truffle version && yarn compile && popd && yarn copy-etc ../../node_modules/protocol/build/contracts
scripts.deploy: pushd ../../node_modules/protocol && rm -rf build && yarn && truffle version && truffle migrate --reset && popd && yarn copy-etc ../../node_modules/protocol/build/contracts
scripts.copy-docs: rm -rf ../../docs/sdk && mkdir ../../docs/sdk && cp docs/index.html ../../docs/sdk && cp README.md ../../docs/sdk
scripts.lcov-badge: lcov-badge -o coverage.svg coverage/lcov.info && sed -i .bak 's/3"/0"/g' coverage.svg && rm *.bak
